definition: one's character/fret (on fingerboard of lute or guitar)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
square/frame/rule/(legal) case/style/character/standard/pattern/(grammar) case/(classical) to obstruct/to hinder/(classical) to arrive/to come/(classical) to investigate/to study exhaustively

sentences.english: The legislation of ZSP is full of innovative characters.
sentences.chinese: 中关村立法充溢着创新性品格。

sentences.english: Sports and games are helpful for character-training.
sentences.chinese: 体育运动有助于品格培养。

sentences.english: I choose my friends for their good characters.
sentences.chinese: 我择友的标准是品格一定要好。

sentences.english: I would not have written, but justice requires my character to be defended.
sentences.chinese: 我本来可以不写，但正义要求我为自己的品格辩护。

sentences.english: Leisure culture is characteristic of both poetry and secularity.
sentences.chinese: 休闲文化具有诗性和世俗性双重品格。

sentences.english: Character is one of the greatest motive powers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 品格乃是世上最伟大的行动力之一。

sentences.english: I would looking to find a person of high moral character, kindhearted, loving family good man.
sentences.chinese: 我要寻找一位品格高尚，善良，热爱家庭的好男人。

sentences.english: Filthy rich people are not not necessarily good-respected unless you possess noble characters.
sentences.chinese: 有钱人未必受人尊敬，除非有高尚的品格。

sentences.english: Setting goals is one of the most effective character-building tools God has given us.
sentences.chinese: 确立目标是上帝给我们塑造品格最有效的工具之一。

sentences.english: Power really is a test of character.
sentences.chinese: 权势的确是一种品格的试练。

sentences.english: I replied, I’m not interested in his character.
sentences.chinese: 我回答说，我对他的品格不感兴趣。

sentences.english: The arts of the Chu State is an antediluvian China's unique phenomenon with southern culture and artistic styles.
sentences.chinese: 楚美术是我国上古时期具有南方文化品格的艺术事象。

sentences.english: The third part is the evaluation of the character educational organizations.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，美国品格教育组织评鉴。

sentences.english: Has exercised the strain capacity in the social practice and serves other people's moral character.
sentences.chinese: 在缈社会实践中锻炼了应变能力和服务他人的品格。

sentences.english: God is staking his character and his reputation on it.
sentences.chinese: 神是在以他的品格和名誉为赌注。

sentences.english: Aspire to appropriate's character, reading must try hard.
sentences.chinese: 立志宜思真品格，读书须尽苦功夫。

definition: firm and indomitable (idiom); tenacious and unyielding
